institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This rule applies to the Skills and Technology Promotion Act (hereinafter referred to as the *Act), the Enforcement Decree of the same Act (hereinafter referred to as the *Enforcement Ordinance), the Enforcement Rules of the same Act (hereinafter referred to as the *Enforcement Rules), and the established regulations of the Ministry of Employment and Labor. In accordance with the “Regulations on the Composition and Operation of the Korean Committee for the International Skills Olympic Games and the National Skills Competition Committee” (hereinafter referred to as *Regulations), the holding and operation of skill competitions entrusted to the Human Resources Development Service of Korea (hereinafter referred to as *Authority) The purpose is to stipulate necessary matters.
